Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1980...
Injured on 8/6/1981 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/1982 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1983...
Signed as a free agent by California on 3/1/1985 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/13/1985 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/17/1986 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 8/8/1986, off Dave Lemanczyk (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/1986, off Dave Lemanczyk (NYY)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1988, hitting .481 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1988...
